components.heading: Semantically connect data across the web and create new knowledge
components.description: We analyse enormous chunks of information, organise it and produce new insights.

pills.heading: Use Knowledge Graphs and gain a holistic view of your data
pills.description: As businesses become more customer centric, it has never been more urgent than today to leverage the connections in your data to make timely operational decisions.

pills.heading: Make graphs a fundamental component of your AI Systems
pills.description: Artificial intelligence is poised to drive the next wave of technological disruption across nearly every industry. Knowledge graphs will provide the foundations.

pills.heading: Use graph data science to uncover insights in networks of data
pills.description: Use algorithms on connected data to evaluate and infer the organization and dynamics of real-world systems.

components.name: imageText
components.headline: _ Smart systems; Smart decisions
components.heading: What is an Enterprise Knowledge Graph and why should you be interested?
components.html: An Enterprise Knowledge Graph is a model of a knowledge domain created by subject-matter experts with the help of intelligent machine learning algorithms. It provides a structure and common interface for all of your data and enables the creation of smart multilateral relations throughout your databases. Structured as an additional virtual data layer, the Knowledge Graph lies on top of your existing databases or data sets to link all your data together at scale â€“ be it structured or unstructured.
